channel.title: How do i make a moparscape server for other people to use?
channel.description:
Does anyone have instruction on how to make a moparscape server?
Thank you!

item.title: How do i make a moparscape server for other people to use?
item.dc:creator: @kyconny kyconny
item.description:
@kyconny wrote:

1.stop being nooby go to RS2 SERVER TUTORIALS

or

2.follow this

step

1.go get a source (google rs2 private server source)
2.FOLLOW TUTS
3.(only if you have router)go to portforward.com
choose your router select any of em and replace the
port with your servers port
4.(only if you dont have a router)google hamachi download itâ€¦
then make a new group called your server and any pass(but remember it!!!)
5.get a no-ip go to no-ip.com and register then go to the manager and add a no-ip(yourserver.no-ip.biz)
6.CLICK RUNSERVER IN YOUR SOURCE
7.advertize it

yea thts right noob suck my dick thts wht i registered as...1 hour later...mmmm non-noob dick

hope my tut helped you wrong topic posting noob

Read full topic
